item.title: Corporate IT is a Kitchen
item.description: Corporate IT is Like a Home Kitchen Internal IT departments are like the home cook that prepares the meals for the family. What you will find: Everyone will complain about your cooking and the meals you make. A few thank yous is all you can expect Everyone will want their own special meals. One person will want vegetarian only, and another will demand more meat. Evertone will ask for more spicy or less spicy.
